page.title: 13INCHINNAN INDUSTRIAL ESTATE
page.content: To the NW of this Estate stands the India Tyres Factory once employing about 2000 people,but closed now for the past four years.The building, though"listed"is crumbling and vandalized,a sad symbol of the high level of unemployment in this area. This level of unemployment is further reflected in the adjacent Industrial Estate developed through the SDA.Of the fourteen units that exist only six are occupied and functioning.These are 'Reekie Machine Tools';'Scot Tubes Ltd';'Gas Measurement Instruments'; 'Bairdswear';'Armour Park'; and 'Metecno'.Of these companies Bairdswear is the biggest employer with around 300 employees. In spite of its ideal situation close to the airport,the M8,Glasgow and Paisley,this Estate seems to be declining.
